author: P V Srividya
text:
Five teenagers, including three juveniles, were arrested for sexually assaulting a 3-year-old girl in Pannanthur, Pochampalli on Friday.

The accused Vignesh (18), Sivabharath (18), along three other boys, 16 and 17 years of age had picked up the little girl, who was playing outside her house and sexually assaulted. The girl had returned home crying and with blood stains on her dress. The child was taken to Dharmapuri government hospital, after the intervention of the Child Welfare Committee, and was transferred to Salem GH. The accused have been arrested.
title: Girl assaulted
